channel.title: HydraScape Advertisement || 150+ player server check it out!
channel.description:
Welcome To HydraScape! Website: [url=http://hydrascape.net]hydrascape.net[/url]
I AM NOT THE OWNER OR CODER FOR THIS SERVER - I AM JUST A PLATINUM DONATOR THAT GOT PERMISSION TO POST THIS ADVERTISEMENT
[IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/2960nmd.jpg[/img]
[size=36pt][font=comic sans ms]Features:[/font][/size] [spoiler]Features: korasi 100% ags/claws 100% torva/pernix/virtus 100% nex 100% godwars chaotics through dungeoneering! minigames and custom ones! full PVP including extra point systems frost dragons full slayer along with duo slayer ( you get double points for duo slayer ) ring of wealth and lucky ring of wealth ( lucky = more of a chance and never breaks ) < also works with thieving! all spirit shield effects work! faithful shield ( like the divine but gives + 22 str bonus ) black partyhat black santa hat ( only 10 of these in-game! ) ironman hard ironman very active forums! ( hydrascape.net ) download client in-game commands such as : ::cluehelp ::ticket ::help ( this ::help command works as a thing like : ::help how do i make bolts < then a staff member will see it and help you out! ) ::guides ( brings you to guides on forums ) ::support ::drops
Donator zones ( mining and such ) donator box and platinum donator box! ( buyable in-game ) youtuber ranks! castle wars! pest control! ZOMBIE SWAT! ( this is a new minigame! ) Tons of achievements ! QUESTS! ( they do work, yes they do! ) Gambling! ( 55x2, Black jack, Planting flowers! ) Strykeworms! Quick Teleports Construction along with buying a house! ( gilded altar also! ) Shooting star events! ( make lunar armour with this ) GRAND EXCHANGE FULLY WORKING ( bugs are being found and patched, so this gets fixed if an error occurs! ) MORE OF THESE, YOU'LL JUST HAVE TO JOIN TO SEE THEM FOR YOURSELF! [/spoiler]
[size=36pt][font=comic sans ms]Pictures:[/font][/size] [spoiler]Faithful Shield ~ [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/28iyypc.jpg[/img] Working Bank Tabs! ~ [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/2nkrub7.jpg[/img] Fire Cape/Kiln Cape! ~ [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/equob6.jpg[/img] [/spoiler]
[size=36pt][font=comic sans ms]Videos:[/font][/size] [spoiler]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A3dlbG1wCJg[/spoiler] Credits: Hydrascape Staff Team High1 ( letting me use video ) I AM ADDING MORE SO PLEASE BE PATIENT AND JOIN IF YOU WANT TO PLAY THE #1 PRIVATE SERVER OF 2015!
Hello, This is being added onto here because i thought it would be neat!
So my name in-game is Signature. I Decided I'm Going to host a give-away next month, ( day is still pending! ) - The giveaway will most likely be Donator Status!

item.title: HydraScape Advertisement || 150+ player server check it out!
item.dc:creator: @HydraScape_Advertise HydraScape Advertisement
item.description:
@HydraScape_Advertise wrote:

Some new things are coming out, Max Capes, and they are debating on a PK Cape, Will be available to all of the players.

Also, dealing with the 62 waves, JAD hits only melee if you stand in the right spot and there is a safe spot.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

64 waves +JAD? Nobody is going to do that, it’s far too much. Even Soulsplit only have 10 waves to get the kiln cape and they’re one of the biggest RSPS’ around.

Read full topic

item.title: HydraScape Advertisement || 150+ player server check it out!
item.dc:creator: @HydraScape_Advertise HydraScape Advertisement
item.description:
@HydraScape_Advertise wrote:

Welcome To HydraScape!
Website: hydrascape.net

I AM NOT THE OWNER OR CODER FOR THIS SERVER - I AM JUST A PLATINUM DONATOR THAT GOT PERMISSION TO POST THIS ADVERTISEMENT

[size=36pt][font=comic sans ms]Features:[/font][/size]
[spoiler]Features:
korasi 100%
ags/claws 100%
torva/pernix/virtus 100%
nex 100%
godwars
chaotics through dungeoneering!
minigames and custom ones!
full PVP including extra point systems
frost dragons
full slayer along with duo slayer ( you get double points for duo slayer )
ring of wealth and lucky ring of wealth ( lucky = more of a chance and never breaks ) < also works with thieving!
all spirit shield effects work!
faithful shield ( like the divine but gives + 22 str bonus )
black partyhat
black santa hat ( only 10 of these in-game! )
ironman
hard ironman
very active forums! ( hydrascape.net )
download client
in-game commands such as :
::cluehelp
::ticket
::help ( this ::help command works as a thing like : ::help how do i make bolts < then a staff member will see it and help you out! )
::guides ( brings you to guides on forums )
::support
::drops

Donator zones ( mining and such )
donator box and platinum donator box! ( buyable in-game )
youtuber ranks!
castle wars!
pest control!
ZOMBIE SWAT! ( this is a new minigame! )
Tons of achievements !
QUESTS! ( they do work, yes they do! )
Gambling! ( 55x2, Black jack, Planting flowers! )
Strykeworms!
Quick Teleports
Construction along with buying a house! ( gilded altar also! )
Shooting star events! ( make lunar armour with this )
GRAND EXCHANGE FULLY WORKING ( bugs are being found and patched, so this gets fixed if an error occurs! )
MORE OF THESE, YOU’LL JUST HAVE TO JOIN TO SEE THEM FOR YOURSELF!
[/spoiler]

[size=36pt][font=comic sans ms]Pictures:[/font][/size]
[spoiler]Faithful Shield ~
Working Bank Tabs! ~
Fire Cape/Kiln Cape! ~
[/spoiler]

[size=36pt][font=comic sans ms]Videos:[/font][/size]
[spoiler]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A3dlbG1wCJg[/spoiler]
Credits:
Hydrascape Staff Team
High1 ( letting me use video )
I AM ADDING MORE SO PLEASE BE PATIENT AND JOIN IF YOU WANT TO PLAY THE #1 PRIVATE SERVER OF 2015!
